text: 1.27 Mat 11.25, Jem 2.5 God pen anɨgɨl gos nɨgak, binɨb gos lum awl nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨpal okok kɨlop gek nebeŋ dɨnɨgel. Anɨb ak tek binɨb sawl sek apal okok kɨlop aglɨl dak. Pen anɨgɨl gos nɨgak, binɨb kɨles mɨdɨl lum awl yɨb yek mɨdebal okok kɨlop gek nebeŋ dɨnɨgel. Anɨb ak tek binɨb kɨles ma mɨdeb apal okok kɨlop aglɨl dak.
